title: Bitcoin price latest: Crypto investors pull $1.1tn as Trump boom fades - The Telegraph

title: Inside the Bitcoin apocalypse: Prices are crashing after fears of a mega-bubble. Now crypto experts give the REAL view on if you should buy or sell - and give their 'bloody hand' warning
description: Bitcoin recently crashed. Does this mean the days of soaring prices are over - and is it is now time to get out or should you hold your nerve. We ask top experts to stare into their crypto crystal balls.
